@graph.name: Easy Vegan Strawberry Shortcake - Nora Cooks
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Strawberry Shortcake with homemade biscuits, lightly sweetened strawberries and fluffy coconut whip in less than an hour.

@graph.name: Easy Vegan Strawberry Shortcake
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Strawberry Shortcake with homemade biscuits, lightly sweetened strawberries and fluffy coconut whip in less than an hour.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup vegan butter, cold and cubed
(2) 14-oz cans  full fat coconut milk OR coconut cream*

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the strawberries: Stir the strawberries and sugar in a large bowl. Cover and set in the fridge until ready to use.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the strawberries: Stir the strawberries and sugar in a large bowl. Cover and set in the fridge until ready to use.

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F and lightly grease a baking sheet. Measure the 1 1/4 cup almond milk and add the tablespoon of apple cider vinegar to it, stir a little and set aside to curdle (this is your buttermilk).
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F and lightly grease a baking sheet. Measure the 1 1/4 cup almond milk and add the tablespoon of apple cider vinegar to it, stir a little and set aside to curdle (this is your buttermilk).

itemListElement.text: Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together in a large bowl. Add the cubed vegan butter and cut into the dry ingredients (may also use a food processor for this). Use a pastry cutter or just your hands. It will look fine and crumbly.
itemListElement.name: Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together in a large bowl. Add the cubed vegan butter and cut into the dry ingredients (may also use a food processor for this). Use a pastry cutter or just your hands. It will look fine and crumbly.

itemListElement.text: Pour the vegan buttermilk into the bowl, and stir until just combined. The dough will be quite sticky. Lightly flour a working surface (such as a clean countertop), and your hands and work the dough into a ball. Gently flatten to about 1/2 inch thick, then cut into circles using a biscuit cutter or even a rounded glass. You should have about 10 biscuits.
itemListElement.name: Pour the vegan buttermilk into the bowl, and stir until just combined. The dough will be quite sticky. Lightly flour a working surface (such as a clean countertop), and your hands and work the dough into a ball. Gently flatten to about 1/2 inch thick, then cut into circles using a biscuit cutter or even a rounded glass. You should have about 10 biscuits.

itemListElement.text: Place on the pan and bake for about 15 minutes, until golden brown on top. Let cool for 10 minutes or so before assembling.
itemListElement.name: Place on the pan and bake for about 15 minutes, until golden brown on top. Let cool for 10 minutes or so before assembling.

recipeInstructions.name: Make the Coconut Whip (if not using store bought cocowhip)

itemListElement.text: Chill the canned coconut milk or cream overnight, being careful not to shake the cans so the cream will remain separate.
itemListElement.name: Chill the canned coconut milk or cream overnight, being careful not to shake the cans so the cream will remain separate.

itemListElement.text: Remove the cans, open and scoop out the hardened coconut cream, leaving the liquid in the can. Add to a large bowl, and beat with a mixer for a minute until creamy. Add vanilla and powdered sugar and beat until creamy, smooth and fluffy. Refrigerate until using so it doesn't melt!
itemListElement.name: Remove the cans, open and scoop out the hardened coconut cream, leaving the liquid in the can. Add to a large bowl, and beat with a mixer for a minute until creamy. Add vanilla and powdered sugar and beat until creamy, smooth and fluffy. Refrigerate until using so it doesn't melt!

itemListElement.text: Slice the biscuits in half and layer with strawberries and coconut whip cream. Serve immediately and enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Slice the biscuits in half and layer with strawberries and coconut whip cream. Serve immediately and enjoy!
